plot outline: Amar, a small-time crook, hears about the mystery of money that was apparently given to Veerappan to free Dr Rajkumar that was never recovered and remains in the forest. He decides to go and get the money by putting together a motley bunch to help him with it. Does he succeed ?
title: Aranyakanda
plot: An ordinary thief who along with his team embarks on a journey in a forest to search for a treasure.

Amar, a small-time crook, hears about the mystery of money that was apparently given to Veerappan to free Dr Rajkumar that was never recovered and remains in the forest. He decides to go and get the money by putting together a motley bunch to help him with it. Does he succeed ?::TNN
